Package com.example.project.activities

package com.example.project.activities
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.example.project
     
    com.example.project.adapters
     
    com.example.project.dialogs
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddingMoodActivity
    Activity for adding a new mood event.
    CommentActivity
    Activity that displays and posts comments related to a specific mood event.
    CommonSpaceActivity
    CommonSpaceActivity with: - advanced filtering (mood, reason, last week) - text-based author search - "Request Follow" button logic - Swipe-to-refresh support.
    EditMoodActivity
    Activity for editing an existing mood event.
    FolloweesMoodsActivity
    Displays up to three most recent moods of each user that the current user follows, from each user the current user is following.
    FollowingUsersActivity
    Activity for displaying the list of users that the logged in user is following.
    FollowManager
    FollowManager handles all functionality related to following users.
    FollowRequest
    "FollowRequest" activity: lists all PENDING requests to the current user.
    LoginActivity
    LoginActivity handles user authentication including login and registration.
    MainActivity
    Main activity of the application.
    mood_mapActivity
    Activity that displays a map with markers representing mood events.
    ProfileActivity
    ProfileActivity can show: - Your own profile (with buttons to logout, add mood, see follow-requests) - Another user's profile (hide those buttons).
